6.29.25  6:35 am   I often times get mildly annoyed when certain songs set themselves up to "transcend" but then... they don't end up transcending. What I mean by transcending is difficult to put in to words, it's something like when a comedian is telling an elaborate joke, the crowd is already dying with laughter BUT THEN he goes even further that noone could've anticipated - like that but just in musical form. Whenever that happens, I often just pause the song and imagine in my mind how I would transcend the song, and then I end up wondering why the artist didn't transcend it like that, or why they didn't transcend it at all. Can you relate to some of this mild annoyance?
